summary: An email from August 14, 2019, forwarding a news article about whether Jeffrey Epstein would receive a Jewish burial despite his crimes. The email includes a quote from Rudyard Kipling and a phone number.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: Subject of the forwarded article discussing whether he will receive a Jewish burial despite his crimes.

persons.name: R. Kipling
persons.context: Source of the quote included in the email signature: 'Trust yourself when all men doubt you, but make allowance for their doubting too'.

events.title: Email about Epstein's burial
events.description: An email is sent forwarding an article questioning whether Jeffrey Epstein will receive a Jewish burial.

keyFacts: An email dated August 14, 2019, discusses the question of whether Jeffrey Epstein will receive a Jewish burial.
The email includes a link to a Forward.com article with the title 'Will Jeffrey Epstein get a Jewish burial despite his crimes and suicide?'
The sender includes a phone number (646-836-6454) and a quote from Rudyard Kipling in the signature.
